data.title: Writers from Flint, Michigan
data.text:
Overview: Kerry Scott Conran is an American film director and screenwriter, best known for creating and directing the 2004 pulp science fiction film Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow.

Date of birth: 6 November 1964

Age: 59

Nationality: American

Occupation: Director

Gender: Male

Overview: Jon Scieszka ( SHESH-kə: which phonetically resembles ścieżka, the Polish word for "path") (born September 8, 1954) is an American children's writer, best known for picture books created with the illu ...

Age: 69

Nationality: American

Occupation: Educator

Gender: Male

Overview: Diane L. Carey-Brodeur (born October 2, 1954) is an American fiction writer, publishing under the pen names Lydia Gregory, Diane Carey, and D. L. Carey.

Date of birth: 2 October 1954

Age: 69

Nationality: American

Occupation: Writer

Gender: Female

Overview: Everette Lynn Harris (June 20, 1955 – July 23, 2009) was an American author. Openly gay, he was best known for his depictions of African-American men who were on the down-low and closeted. He authored ...

Date of death: 23 July 2009

Occupation: Screenwriter

Overview: Bernard Egan "Ben" Hamper (born c. 1956) is a Michigan-based writer. He was born in Flint, Michigan, to a family that had many former employees of General Motors amongst its members. Hamper also worked ...

Overview: John Sinclair (October 2, 1941 – April 2, 2024) was an American poet, writer, and political activist from Flint, Michigan. Sinclair's defining style is jazz poetry, and he released most of his works in ...

Date of death: 2 April 2024

Age: 82 (age at death)

Occupation: Writer

Overview: David Petersen (born July 4, 1977) is an American comic book creator best known for the series Mouse Guard.
